price: Allah, sigurno, zna tajne nebesa i Zemlje i Allah dobro vidi ono što radite.”
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu ghayba al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā taʿmalūna
